channel.title: Industry city sleepers - Don't Let this Go (Nick Elle Remix) [Deep House]
channel.description:
Hey, guys, it's your friendly neighborhood audio engineer, Nick Elle.
I've been sitting on this remix for a while, and now, the label says it's time...
I'm proud to present to you, my remix of @iammane track "Don't Let this Go!" It's a little Deep House ditty, featuring my flawless (flawed ;P ) singing and my signature Lush House sound. Give it a listen, and I hope y'all like it.
https://soundcloud.com/lytheum-recordings/industry-city-sleepers-dont-let-this-go-nick-elle-remix
Ps. I was hired onto [this label](https://soundcloud.com/lytheum-recordings) as a talent scout, so if you're interested in releasing with them, please hit me up. This label is brand new, so we're looking for lots of music from lots of people. :)

item.title: Industry city sleepers - Don't Let this Go (Nick Elle Remix) [Deep House]
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
5 seconds in and I’m having '90s clubbing flashbacks!

Where’s my Evian, lollipops and amphetamines, dammit!?

Read full topic
item.source: Industry city sleepers - Don't Let this Go (Nick Elle Remix) [Deep House]
